answers.answer: the test just checks your sugar levels. you should eat a good meal at least 2 hrs before than dont eat anything else until after your testing is done. the drink isnt that bad at all anymore. it tastes like orange soda. if your sugar levels are too high then they are just going to make you cut down on the sugar you eat. its nothing to be worried about.

The drink isn't that bad I had the Orange one to me it tastes like really sweet hi-c they do it to check sugar levels to see if ur at risk for gestational diabetes nothing to worry about im sure you'll pass it
Im eating the jelly beans lol.

I took mine last week. Doctor told me not to fast, but I still didn't eat past 9 the night before and didn't eat breakfast. The orange literally tasted like a sunkist. It's not bad at all, I did get a huge headache after I drank it though. But whatever you do, don't throw up after you drink. I passed my 1 hour test.
Fruit punch wasn't terrible.  Tastes like Koolaid and Gatorade kinda.
I was told not to have anything to eat or drink from 10 the night before and then nothing till after the second lot of bloods were took

question: Our baby's moving a lot!! What's this glucose test we all have to go through. All I hear is fast and a horriable drink and women fail. Why what is this drink. Why do so many women hate it!???
title: 23 weeks 4 days!!! glucose test questions.
